metadata.description: This tag will be used as a prefix for the hostname of the SAS servers and Azure resources
Allow inbound SSH traffic to the Ansible Controller-Bastion Host from this CIDR block or IP address range. Must be a valid IP or CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x or x.x.x.x/x
Virtual Network CIDR, ex. 10.10.0.0/16
Virtual Network Public Subnet CIDR, ex. 10.10.1.0/24 which should allign with VNET CIDR
Virtual Network Private Subnet CIDR, ex. 10.10.2.0/24 which should allign with VNET CIDR

This is the SKU for the Ansible VM. The default SKU value represents the minimum recommended size for system stability in most SAS software license sets. The selected SKU must support premium disks. For details: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-in/pricing/details/virtual-machines/red-hat/

This is the SKU for the Windows Server VM. The default SKU value represents the minimum recommended size for system stability in most SAS software license sets. The selected SKU must support premium disks

This is the SKU for the Meta VM.The default SKU value represents the minimum recommended size for system stability in most SAS software license sets. The selected SKU must support premium disks. For details: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-in/pricing/details/virtual-machines/red-hat/

This is the SKU for the Compute VM.The default SKU value represents the minimum recommended size for system stability in most SAS software license sets. The selected SKU must support premium disks. For details: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-in/pricing/details/virtual-machines/red-hat/

This is the SKU for the Mid VM. The default SKU value represents the minimum recommended size for system stability in most SAS software license sets. The selected SKU must support premium disks. For details: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-in/pricing/details/virtual-machines/red-hat/
The SAS data volume size for SAS 94
Username for the Virtual Machine.
Password for RDP login & SAS admin account in SAS servers
Password for SAS Internal Accounts(Metadata & WIP)
Virtual Network Private Subnet CIDR, ex. 10.10.3.0/24 which should allign with VNET CIDR

This is the SKU for the MicroServices VM. The default SKU value represents the minimum recommended size for system stability in most SAS software license sets. The selected SKU must support premium disks. For details: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-in/pricing/details/virtual-machines/red-hat/

This is the SKU for the SPRE VM. The default SKU value represents the minimum recommended size for system stability in most SAS software license sets. The selected SKU must support premium disks. For details: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-in/pricing/details/virtual-machines/red-hat/

This is the SKU for the CASController VM. The default SKU value represents the minimum recommended size for system stability in most SAS software license sets. The selected SKU must support premium disk. For details: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-in/pricing/details/virtual-machines/red-hat/

This is the SKU for the CAS Worker VM. The default SKU value represents the minimum recommended size for system stability in most SAS software license sets. The selected SKU must support premium disks. For details: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-in/pricing/details/virtual-machines/red-hat/
The number of CAS Worker Nodes to create.
The SAS data volume size for SAS Viya.
Storage AccountName where SAS Depot is located
Storage Account Key
File Share Name where SASDepot is located
Folder Name in Azure File share where SAS94 depot is located
Folder Name in Azure File share where SAS Viya Repo is located
Name of SAS Application Server License file.You will find this file inside the SAS Software Depot. It should be inside the folder sid_file.

Key Vault Owner Object ID,Specifies the object ID of a user, service principal or security group in the Azure Active Directory tenant for the vault.Get it by using Get-AzADUser or Get-AzADServicePrincipal cmdlets. e.g.In Azure Cloud PowerShell type PS> Get-AzADUser -UserPrincipalName user@domain.com | grep Id
The full ssh public key that will be added to the servers.
Azure Resources location, where all the SAS 94 and Viya resources should be created. e.g. servers, disks, IP's etc.

The base URI where artifacts required by this template are located. When the template is deployed using the accompanying scripts, a private location in the subscription will be used and this value will be automatically generated.

The sasToken required to access _artifactsLocation.  When the template is deployed using the accompanying scripts, a sasToken will be automatically generated. Use the defaultValue if the staging location is not secured.
